description.value: This stance option replaces a different Stance Shift option (usually Secure Grapple Stance). +2 to attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Feint]. If the mixed martial artist rolls a critical failure to Feint, they get a failure instead. If they successfully Feint, they can use Stance Shift as a free action. Unlike other stances, in this stance the mixed martial artist can't make Strikes.
